modShortDescription: Tweaks the Ratchet and Impact Driver - Ratchet has a higher fire rate than the Wrench, Impact Driver has reduced stamina cost as it's powered.
modDescription:
Tweaks the Ratchet and Impact Driver – [Ratchet](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/) has a higher fire rate than the Wrench, Impact Driver has reduced stamina cost as it’s powered.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/saminal1/samsmods-a20/tree/main/SRealisticSalvage)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/26324-sams-stuff-all-a20-server-side-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Saminal](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/saminal/)
